properties.URL_1: See more about this water plant's solar
properties.Describe: A water treatment plant that is a big part of the city's goal to provide a minimum of 20% of city operations energy from renewable sources by 2025. 15% of the plant's energy use is supported by the installation.

properties.URL_1: Learn more about the solar power at this justice building
properties.Describe: Justice will be served! The installation will offset building electrical demand by 12% thanks to this solar installation completed December 2014

properties.Location: 2050 W Rio Salado Pkwy Tempe  AZ 85281

properties.Describe: The East Valley Bus Operations and Maintenance guardhouse provides protection and solar power!

properties.Building: Household Product Collection Center and Fire Training Facility

properties.Describe: A location for Tempe residents to safely dispose of household hazardous waste and an opportunity fo the city to produce 3000 kilowatt hours of energy annually

properties.Describe: Handles utiilty requests for the residents of Tempe.

properties.Location: 2050 W. Rio Salado Parkway, Tempe, AZ 85281
properties.Describe: The complex is home to 250 busses that are maintained and serviced at the location and is the nation's first gold certified transit maintenance facility.

properties.Building: Tempe Town Lake Water Park Ramada
properties.URL_1: Read more about this solar project at Tempe Town Lake
properties.Describe: Ramada of Tempe Town Lake's childrens water park area, solar panels on top
Providing transportation support and sustainable design features like permeable concrete, a roof garden, solar power, and rainwater recovery.
Used fryer oil can be brought here for recycling into biofuel
